00074  static bool CompareBytes(const char* pBuffer, const void* pBytes, int iCount)
00075  {
00076   return memcmp(pBuffer, pBytes, iCount) == 0;
00077  }

00079  static void ReadBytes(void* pDestination, const char* pSource, int iCount)
00080  {
00081   for (int i = 0; i < iCount; i++)
00082    ((char*)pDestination)[i] = pSource[iCount - i - 1];
00083  }
00084 
00085  static void WriteBytes(char* pDestination, const void* pSource, int iCount)
00086  {
00087   for (int i = 0; i < iCount; i++)
00088    pDestination[i] = ((char*)pSource)[iCount - i - 1];
00089  }
00090 
00091  static bool CompareBytes(const char* pBuffer, const void* pBytes, int iCount)
00092  {
00093   for (int i = 0; i < iCount; i++)
00094    if (pBuffer[i] != ((char*)pBytes)[iCount - i - 1])
00095     return false;
00096   return true;
00097  }
